reviewText: These guys did a good job so if you're a sox fan this is for you. No offense to these filmmakers ut, how many times can they do this about the Red Sox? This is the third one so far and I just read about another. My favorite fan film is the one about Mets fans. This documentary is great! It's entertaining, realistic,sad, embarrassing and even scary. I'm a huge fan and I identified with the mets one the most. It's call Mathematically Alive: A Story of Fandom. Mathematically Alive: A Story of Fandom DVD

This is the quintessential fan perspective on the 2004 Red Sox Season. This isn't game footage, it's fan footage, exposing the psychosis, developed over 86 years, that Red Sox fans are afflicted with.
